item.title: European Central Bank holds interest rates as tariff turmoil keeps policymakers on edge
item.description: It is the central bank's first interest rate hold this year, as inflation settles around its 2% target.

item.title: Trump's aluminum tariffs may be sparking a green recycling boom â€” unintentionally
item.description: His protectionist trade policy, often at odds with environmental goals, is in fact building an economic case for recycling millions of tonnes of scrap...

item.title: El-Erian breaks ranks with Wall Street, says Powell should resign to preserve Fed independence
item.description: El-Erian, president of Queens' College at Cambridge University, said he was aware that his view did not align with the Wall Street consensus.

item.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent calls for a review of 'the entire' Federal Reserve
item.description: Bessent suggested for a review that would go beyond the current controversy over building renovations.

item.title: Brexit made businesses abandon the UK. Trump's hefty EU tariffs could bring them back
item.description: President Trump's threatened 30% tariffs on the EU might prompt some businesses to take another look at the U.K.
